author: TenPlus1
long_description:
A simple mod that adds simple hunger into your game which slowly ticks down as you play.

- Sprint by holding down Aux1 key which is usually (E), only with enough stamina.
- Get drunk by eating 4x food or drink with {alcohol} group.
- Drink milk from mobs or farming mod to counteract poison and drunk effects.

Supports 3d_armor, POVA and player_monoids mods.
name: stamina
short_description: Adds stamina and hunger (this fork adds drunk effects and player_monoids/pova support)
title: Stamina (Fork)
